w :  i really enjoyed the tv special about giraffes last night .  did you get home in time to see it ?
m :  oh  yes  but i wish i could have stayed awake long enough to see the whole thing .

question: what does the man mean ?
choice: he was looking forward to seeing the giraffes .
he enjoyed watching the animal performance .
he fell asleep in the middle of the tv program .
answer: he fell asleep in the middle of the tv program .
